text: The General Council (, ) is the unicameral parliament of Andorra. It is sometimes known as the General Council of the Valleys because it was the historical name and it is to make it different from similarly named parliaments in the Val d'Aran and in France.Merc√® Bonell: "Vaig entrar al Consell General espantada" ==References== Category:Organizations based in Andorra Category:Unicameral legislatures
title: General Council (Andorra)
